text: The 1987 Oregon State Beavers football team represented Oregon State University in the Pacific-10 Conference (Pac-10) during the 1987 NCAA Division I-A football season. In their third season under head coach Dave Kragthorpe, the Beavers compiled a 2–9 record (0–7 against Pac-10 opponents), finished in last place in the Pac-10, and were outscored by their opponents, 433 to 189. The team played its home games at Parker Stadium in Corvallis, Oregon. ==Schedule== ==Roster== *Robb Thomas (offense) ==References== Category:Oregon State Beavers football seasons Oregon State Category:1987 in sports in Oregon
title: 1987 Oregon State Beavers football team
